title: LA VECINA'S GARDEN

scenes.script: The friends walked down a sunny street. They were going to see Frances. 'Frances might have stories too,' said Layla. 'She has lived here a long time.'
scenes.prompt: Four friends walking down sunny suburban street heading somewhere. Layla speaking with anticipation. Pleasant neighborhood setting.

scenes.script: They found Frances in her garden. She had dirt on her hands. Tomatoes and peppers grew all around her. She looked up and smiled. 'Hello! Come help me dig!'
scenes.prompt: Frances in her flourishing garden, kneeling with dirt on hands. Tomatoes and peppers growing. Looking up warmly at arriving friends. Welcoming gesture.

scenes.script: Frances showed them the seeds from before. The tiny seeds were now small plants! 'Remember when these were so tiny?' she asked.
scenes.prompt: Frances showing friends small growing plants in garden bed. Reference to seeds they planted before. Plants growing nicely. Proud moment.

scenes.script: The friends told Frances about their Community Market. They told her about Mr. Mason's stories. 'Do you have stories about markets too?' they asked.
scenes.prompt: Friends gathered in garden talking animatedly to Frances. Telling her about their market plans. Frances listening with interest.

scenes.script: Frances got a special look in her eyes. It was the look people get when they remember something nice. 'I do have a story. Let me tell you about Doña Carmen.'
scenes.prompt: Frances with distant remembering expression, touched by memory. Friends watching expectantly. Story about to begin.

scenes.script: The garden seemed to shimmer. Colors changed. Now they saw an old neighborhood. The houses looked different. The cars looked old. This was from a long time ago.
scenes.prompt: Magical transition - Frances's garden fading into old neighborhood from decades ago. Older cars, different style houses. Warm nostalgic colors.

scenes.script: A little girl walked down the street. It was young Frances! She had coins in her pocket. Her mama had sent her to buy tomatoes.
scenes.prompt: Young Frances walking down old neighborhood street with coins in hand. Little girl on errand. Vintage neighborhood setting.

scenes.script: Young Frances came to a house. A small table sat in the front yard. Tomatoes, peppers, and herbs lay on the table. An old woman stood there. Her name was Doña Carmen.
scenes.prompt: Young Frances arriving at Doña Carmen's yard stand. Simple table with fresh tomatoes, peppers, herbs. Doña Carmen standing behind table with warm smile.

scenes.script: 'Hola, Francesita!' said Doña Carmen with a warm smile. She knew everyone in the neighborhood. 'How is your mama? How is school?'
scenes.prompt: Doña Carmen greeting young Frances warmly by name. Neighborly personal connection. Caring expression, asking about family.

scenes.script: Doña Carmen helped young Frances pick the best tomatoes. 'Feel this one,' she said. 'See how it gives a little? That means it is ready.'
scenes.prompt: Doña Carmen guiding young Frances's hand to feel tomato ripeness. Teaching moment. Gentle instruction about choosing produce.

scenes.script: Young Frances paid for the tomatoes. But Doña Carmen added extra peppers to the bag! 'For your mama,' she said. 'We are neighbors. This is how it works.'
scenes.prompt: Doña Carmen adding extra peppers to young Frances's bag as a gift. Generous neighborly gesture. Young Frances looking grateful.

scenes.script: Young Frances walked home. She could see Doña Carmen's garden from the street. She knew exactly where her tomatoes grew. She knew who planted them.
scenes.prompt: Young Frances walking home holding bag, looking back at Doña Carmen's garden visible from street. Personal connection to food source.

scenes.script: This was different from a big store. At the store, you do not know anyone. At Doña Carmen's, you are like family. Mama trusted Doña Carmen.
scenes.prompt: Split visual or warm scene showing the personal connection - young Frances at Doña Carmen's vs impersonal store concept. Trust and community.

scenes.script: The old neighborhood faded away. Colors shifted back to now. Frances sat in her garden. The friends were listening. The memory was over.
scenes.prompt: Magical transition back - old neighborhood fading. Present-day Frances in her garden with friends listening. Memory complete.

scenes.script: 'Doña Carmen taught me about growing and sharing,' said Frances. 'I try to do the same with my seed library. Now I am teaching you.'
scenes.prompt: Frances speaking emotionally about passing on Doña Carmen's legacy. Friends listening respectfully. Generational wisdom transfer.

scenes.script: 'What made her stand special?' asked Ellis. Frances smiled. 'You knew her. You trusted her. She cared about what she sold because she cared about YOU.'
scenes.prompt: Ellis asking thoughtful question. Frances answering warmly about trust and caring. Key lesson about personal connection in commerce.

scenes.script: The friends thought about their Community Market. 'Our market should feel like this,' said Layla. 'Like a neighborhood. Like neighbors helping neighbors.'
scenes.prompt: Layla speaking with growing vision. Friends nodding. Connecting Frances's story to their market plans. Community feeling.

scenes.script: Frances had an idea. 'What would YOU sell at a stand?' she asked. 'What would you make or grow or share?'
scenes.prompt: Frances asking friends to imagine their own contributions. Friends thinking about what they could offer. Personal reflection.

scenes.script: The friends got excited. 'I would do art!' said Riley. 'I could help organize!' said Ellis. 'I am good at carrying heavy things!' said Benny. Layla was not sure yet.
scenes.prompt: Riley, Ellis, Benny each excited about their contribution. Layla looking thoughtful, uncertain about her role. Finding their places.

scenes.script: 'I have more stories to tell,' said Frances. 'But one at a time. Like good tomatoes ripening.' The friends smiled.
scenes.prompt: Frances with warm smile promising more stories. Friends smiling, anticipating more. Garden setting, afternoon light.
